Articles.Content:
So, does that mean this will no longer work, does it need an update?

I understood it to mean that the mod needs to be updated to use Kopernicus instead of RSS, but I could be mistaken.
I recommend K2 for a larger Kerbin. Not quite as much challenge, but it's a rounder number than 3.2.

I recommend K2 for a larger Kerbin. Not quite as much challenge, but it's a rounder number than 3.2.

Well, you've got at least one customer if you decide to update this mod. 3.7 is a little bit too much, and 2 too little for my taste.
